aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-4974-459 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Ejector rack retention failure. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 06/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 07/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 08/01/2025 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 11/01/2025 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 14/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
